Articles.Content: Hello i still new with making some Add-on for Kerbal space program and lately i searched for some good tutorial i also checked the thread "Mod Development Links Compilation - START HERE" but i didn't find any enough tutorial for setting up an engine using unity for beginners so could anyone suggest me a good tutorial on YouTube or somewhere...and thanks

Your 3d model should consist of a "plate" for the nozzle to hang from, the nozzle itself and a fairing for the engine.

I find this really helpful, it's a fully made engine in unity https://www.dropbox.com/s/5kw13e7p821s8ca/EngineExample.zip simply put it into a unity project
